StarGardener.title: Star Gardener
StarGardener.description: Star Gardener is a single-player exploration game where you collect the last traces of pollen to restore and make it bloom again. By strategically spreading the pollen, you can progress through this lost world and discover more about the journey ahead.
StarGardener.longDescription:
As the lead 3D artist on Star Gardener, I played a key role in shaping the game’s artistic direction and producing its visual elements.

Main Character
Modeling, Texturing & Shaders: I created the 3D model, textures, and a custom shader to seamlessly fit the game’s aesthetic.
Rigging & Skinning: I handled the rigging and skinning, ensuring smooth deformations and optimized integration for animation and gameplay.
Environment
Rock Assets: I modeled and textured various rock formations, contributing to the game's visual identity and atmosphere.
Procedural Materials: I developed materials in Substance Designer, including sand and grass, to create high-quality, optimized surfaces.
Custom Grass in Unreal Engine: I designed a custom grass system using advanced shaders and a custom wind effect, enhancing realism and immersion.
My work helped establish a strong artistic cohesion for Star Gardener while optimizing performance for a smooth and immersive experience.

You can download the game on itch.io : https://loyyxa.itch.io/star-gardener
